desc: The Artsy Chocolatier by Rebekka Schmitt, loves the idea of bringing people joy through Chocolate. Powered by Valhrona TM Chocolate with their intricate flavour profiles, we craft our unique truffles, tablet and bonbons to bring you pure chocolate joy!

layout.text: There are many variations of Chocolate Joy. Let us help you find a bite of happiness cleverly disguised as a piece of chocolate.
